name: Groovy Hoovy and The Kats in the Kitchen
name_original: Groovy Hoovy and The Kats in the Kitchen
description:
In Groovy Hoovy a Vacuum Simulator, you play as a Vacuum Cleaner left by their owner to an out of control cat party! Clean up the cat mess before the house explodes!

- Includes kitchen level, with more levels likely in a future patch.

- Controller Support

- Become a vacuum cleaner!

- And clean fun!

*Fixed Cutscenes and Introduction*
